version_description:
- Infinite loading error fixed
- Other stability improvements
- General housekeeping

- Dream Peak competition event
- Two new power-ups: slingshot and shuffle
- Facebook Connect to store your progress to the Cloud
- New levels every week

- Fixed loading issues
- Fixed game freezing after levels
- Other smaller fixes
- Dream Peak competition event
- Two new power-ups: slingshot and shuffle
- Facebook Connect to store your progress to the Cloud
- New levels every Friday

Chuck’s Challenge competition event
New level mechanic: Paint Jar

Chuck’s challenge competition event
Connection fixes!

Fixes for connection issues
Fixes for life generation
Various smaller fixes

Bug Fixes!
Connection Fixes!!
Dreamy Holidays everyone!!!
Made some minor improvements to make this dream even sweeter!
Minor changes & bug fixes. Our team won't sleep until Dream Blast is bug free!

Blasting Dream Bubbles just got way better!
- NEW: Introducing teams. Join or create a team and donate lives to keep you and your friends playing.
- NEW: Team events. Be challenged as a team to complete team-challenges.
- NEW: Unlock new avatars!

Chuck is playing Cupid in an extra romantic Valentine's Event! Play some lovely limited-time challenges, and earn fantastic rewards that will make your heart flutter!
– NEW Valentine's Day event!
– Bug fixes, minor improvements.

Another day, another update with some dreamy new features:
- Win Streak event: Winning games in a row now gives you that extra feathery edge!
- Brand new event: Dream Catcher Event.
- Dreaming is hungry work, bugs were eaten as midnight snacks!

Minor changes & bug fixes. Our team won't sleep until Dream Blast is bug free!

Blasting Dream Bubbles just got way better!

Running out of lives or power-ups? - not anymore!
Introducing Stella's Store!
- Play levels and find cherries
- Bring cherries back to Stella and exchange them to coins, power-ups or unlimited lives!

Running out of lives or power-ups? - not anymore!
Introducing Stella's Store!
- Play levels and find cherries
- Bring cherries back to Stella and exchange them to coins, power-ups or unlimited lives!
Made some improvements and blasted some bugs. Time for a nap!

Introducing: chats!
Need more lives or have anything to share with your team-members? - Now you can chat with your team mates!

Introducing: chats!

It's time for a dreamy Holiday Event update!
- Celebrate the holiday with the birds! Help them collect jingle bells from levels to earn special rewards and exclusive Holiday Avatar in a limited-time Holiday event!

Celebrate 10 years of Angry Birds!

Join a limited-lime Angry Birds 10th anniversary event! Unlock the story and evolution of the Angry Birds character over the years, and earn dreamy rewards!
Play the brand new limited time Angry Birds Movie 2 event with a brand new single player progression event! Play through levels to advance in your journey to Eagle Island!

Trick or treat! The birds are on the hunt for Halloween treats. Help them collect pumpkins and earn special rewards in a limited-time Halloween event!
– New Halloween event
– Double rewards! Complete an event level in one try and earn twice the rewa

The flock needs your help! Join the adventure and dismantle Zeta's secret weapon and save the bird Island.
New features:
- Player Medals: Are you one that always manages to beat all of our events? Now you can show it to the world with medals!
